name: Egony
description: Egony - board game in real time with turn-based battle and unit rental between players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86 Memory: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86 Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
